original_title: Three arrested for gang raping teenage girl in Meegoda
original_body_lines: Colombo, Feb. 16 (Daily Mirror)- Three individuals including a 61-year-old mason were arrested for gang raping a 12-year-old girl in Meegoda, Police said.
Police said the girl had been raped by the three individuals on several occasions from December last year.
The suspects were arrested by the Meegoda police yesterday following a complaint.
